name: Aveyond 6 - The Swordsman's Fighting Dawn Legacy
name_original: Aveyond 6 - The Swordsman's Fighting Dawn Legacy
description: Safe to play.  No harm has been ever done while doing this game, ah and this game storyline is based on the accelerated remakes of both aveyond and ahriman's game series, the full has still to come when both ahriman's prophecy reboot which is a continuation for the aveyond series, had been finished entirely since this is a accelerated fanmade game based on both of them this might be updating with the flow of the game series being updated constantly also The game storyline of this game is based on both ahriman's prophecy and aveyond game series, but the game characters are not related to either aveyond or ahriman's prophecy game series since they are originally made, and that's how this game is made, also one day while exploring the new accelerated worlds, this is an outcome known for that old worlds to be destroyed and the reality to be rewritten in a strangely way this is how the history will restart then a new order and harmonical worlds will be created with this outcome
